description: This file defines the TagProvider class, which extends ChangeNotifier to manage the list of Tag objects, providing functionalities to initialize, reload, and ensure tags via TagRepository.

classes.name: TagProvider
classes.description: A provider class for managing tags and notifying listeners upon changes.

methods.name: initialize
methods.description: Initializes the provider by loading all tags.

methods.name: reload
methods.description: Reloads the list of tags from the repository and notifies listeners.

methods.name: ensureTags
methods.description: Ensures that all specified tag names exist in the repository and reloads the tags.
